quote: One felt that in her renunciation of life she had deliberately abandoned those places in which she might at least have been able to see the man she loved, for others where he had never trod.
quote_letters: ONE FELT THAT IN HER RENUNCIATION OF LIFE SHE HAD DELIBERATELY ABANDONED THOSE PLACES IN WHICH SHE MIGHT AT LEAST HAVE BEEN ABLE TO SEE THE MAN SHE LOVED FOR OTHERS WHERE HE HAD NEVER TROD
